title: Low Tide on Grand Pré - nature and humanity

content.question: Lines 6-9 (“And yet...stream”) suggest which of the following about nature and humanity?

choices.label: Humanity is unable to understand nature.
Humanity needs nature to experience ecstasy.
Nature lacks any intention of comforting humanity.
Nature dreams more richly than humanity.

content.answer: Nature lacks any intention of comforting humanity.

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Identify and explain the function of personification.
